Brazil: After several years of open warfare, the Dutch withdraw from Brazil; the Portuguese paid off a war debt in payments of salt.
Russia: Khmelnytsky Uprising: Under the Treaty of Pereyaslav, Left-bank Ukraine, the territory of the Zaporozhian Host, allies itself with Muscovy.
Russo-Polish War (1654–1667): The Muscovite army invaded Poland.
Sweden: Queen Christina abdicates her throne and converts to Roman Catholicism, creating a major scandal.
Taiwan: Locusts, plague, and earthquakes greatly damage Taiwan
